item.description:
Early stage business owners have a lot on their minds and, when it comes to negotiating licenses or commercial contracts, need to minimize mistakes.

The Scibelli Enterprise Center (SEC) is hosting the second of its Emerging/Growth Seminar Series to help businesses grow.


Making the Most of Licenses and Commercial Contracts

Tuesday, November 13, 2012 at the SEC

5:30 – 7:30pm

FREE, but must register

http://emerginggrowthatsec2.eventbrite.com

 

Will Perkins and Amy Mugherini, partners in the Boston-based law firm, Bingham McCutchen, will return to the SEC to deliver this highly relevant and worthwhile seminar and answer these questions:

  • What should I look out for when licensing my technology?
  • How do I read the fine print in commercial contracts?
  • How do I ensure I'm protected when signing a contract with a partner?
  • How can I make these agreements be win-win?

This seminar is part of Bingham's sponsorship of ACTION, the Association of CleanTech Incubators of New England, but all companies will benefit from this topic.

Come for networking and information.  Light refreshments will be served.

Pass this invitation on, please.
item.name: Business Seminar: Making the Most of Licenses and Commercial Contracts
